Name: Thorns
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

Remove up to {dice green 3 5+} to place an equal number of hit tokens in the damage box

Name: Entangling Roots
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

Spot {dice green,red 1 7+} to roll an additional blue dice and gain ATTRITION + 1
Effect: spot: { colour: ['green', 'red'], minTarget: 7, maxToSpot: 1, attributesIncreased: ['dice_self_blue', attrition] }

Name: Demoralizing Roar
Raw Description:
You must have Bear Form equipped to use this power.

Start of your Dice Pool step:

Add {dice green 2} to your dice pool

Name: Insect Swarm
Raw Description:
Start of your Dice Pool step:

Add {dice green 2} to your dice pool and gain ATTRITION + 2
Effect: [ { attributeChange: { amount: 2, type: 'increase', attribute: 'dice_self_green' } }, { attributeChange: { type: 'increase', amount: 2, attribute: 'attrition' } }

Name: Bear Form
Raw Description: Add {dice red 2}{dice green 1} to your dice pool
Effect: [ { attributeIncrease: { amount: 2, attribute: 'dice_self_red' } }, { attributeIncrease: { amount: 1, attribute: 'dice_self_green' } }

Name: Faerie Fire
Raw Description:
Start of your Dice Pool step:

Lower the Threat value of all your opponents by 1 until the end of this combat round

Name: Frenzied Regeneration
Raw Description:
Start of your action:

Regain X Health

Name: Maul
Raw Description:
You must have Bear Form equipped to use this power.

During your Place Tokens step:

You may move up to 2 hit tokens from the defense box into the damage box

Name: Enrage
Raw Description:
You must have Bear Form equipped to use this power.

Start of your Dice Pool step:

You may remove up to {dice green 3} from your dice pool. Gain 1 Energy for each {dice green 1} you remove. At the end of combat, lose any Energy in excess of your capacity

Name: Mark of the Wild
Raw Description: Each friendly participating character may add {dice green 1} to their dice pool

Name: Rejuvenation
Raw Description:
After a friendly participating character loses Health:

That character regains up to 2 health. Then unequip Rejuvination

Name: Claw
Raw Description:
You must have Cat Form equipped to use this power.

Start of your Dice Pool step:

Add {dice red 2} to your dice pool. If this is the first combat round, add an additional {dice blue 1} to your dice pool.
Effect: [{attributeChange: { type: 'increase', amount: 2,  attribute:'dice_self_red' }},  {atRound: {round: { absolute: 1 }, attributeChanges: [{type:'increase',  amount: 1, attribute: 'dice_self_blue'}]}]

Name: Prowl
Raw Description:
You may choose to take a Travel action even if your character is in a region containing one or more independent creatures.

During your travel action:

You may move through regions occupied by independent creatures.

Name: Rip
Raw Description:
You must have Cat Form equipped to use this power.

End of your Reroll step:

Spot {dice red 1 7+} to place 1 hit token in the damage box.

If you use Claw during this combat round you also gain ATTRITION + 1
Effect: [{spot: { colour: ['green'], min: 5, maxToSpot: 3, attributesIncreased: ['damage'] }}, { useInRound: { power: 'Claw', attributeChanges: [{type: 'increase', amount: 1, attribute: 'attrition'}] }]

Name: Moonfire
Raw Description:
Add {dice blue 2} to your dice pool.

If you used Moonfire during the previous combat round, you may add an additional {dice blue 1} to your dice pool.
Effect: [{attributeChange: { type: 'increase', amount: 2, attribute: 'dice_self_blue'}}, {useInRound: { power: 'Moonfire', round: { relative: -1 }, attributeChanges:[{type: 'increase', amount: 1, attribute: 'dice_self_blue'}]}]

Name: Cat Form
Raw Description: Add {dice red 3} to your dice pool

Name: Healing Touch
Raw Description:
After a friendly participating character loses a Health:

That character regains up to 3 health

Name: Ferocious Bite
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

If your Cat Form is equipped, spend any amount of your available Energy. Change {dice blue 1} into a {dice red 1 8} for each Energy you spend.

Name: Barkskin
Raw Description:
End of your Reroll step:

Place 3 armor tokens in the defense box. Then unequip Barkskin

Name: Tranquility
Raw Description:
Start of your Dice Pool step:

Each friendly participating character regains 3 Health. Then unequip Tranquility.

Name: Starfire
Raw Description: Add {dice blue 4} to your dice pool

Name: Ravage
Raw Description:
You must have Cat Form and Prowl equipped to use this power.

Start of your first Dice Pool step:

Add {dice blue 3}{dice red 1} to your dice pool
Effect: atRound: {round: { absolute: 1 }, attributeChanges: [{attributeChange: { type: 'increase', amount: 3 attribute: 'dice_self_blue'}}, {attributeChange: { type: 'increase', amount: 1, attribute:'dice_self_red'}}]}
